Articles.Content:
This is a place for aircraft pilots and aircraft engineers to discuss their achievements, designs and goals. I will list a series of achievements for those to achieve and what others have done. I would like this to be a place where pilots and engineers can enjoy flying on Earth in KSP, rather than picking up MFSX.

I ask that you please list any info about your aircraft if at all possible. Just list the mods used if possible.

The best aircrafts will be featured here on the OP.
I'm working on a propeller passenger aircraft and also a supersonic passenger aircraft.
